headline:
Free & Open Source
QR Code Generator

metadata.title: QRcodly - Free & Open Source QR Code Generator
metadata.description: Easily create fully customizable and stylish QR codes with QRcodly, a free QR code generator. Generate QR codes for URLs, text, Wi-Fi, vCards, and more. Easy to use, secure, and perfect for personal or business use. Start now!
metadata.keywords: free QR code generator, QR code creator, generate QR codes, custom QR code maker

featuresCta.headline: Overview of Key Features
featuresCta.subHeadline: With QRcodly you can create, edit, manage, and analyze QR codes â€“ all in one place.

editFeature.headline: Edit QR Codes Anytime
editFeature.subHeadline: Create QR codes for free and change the destination URL even after printing.

statisticFeature.headline: Real-Time QR Code Analytics
statisticFeature.subHeadline: Track how often and where your QR codes are scanned â€“ in real time.

overviewFeature.headline: Organized QR Code Collection
overviewFeature.subHeadline: Keep all your generated QR codes in one central, easy-to-manage location.

templateFeature.headline: Create Designs with Templates
templateFeature.subHeadline: Save time and ensure consistent branding. Use your design templates to quickly apply styles to new QR codes.

teamFeature.headline: Collaborate in Teams
teamFeature.subHeadline: Invite team members and work together on QR codes. Perfect for companies, agencies, and teams.
